article_title: How To Minimize Conflicts Of Interest In Medical Research

article_metadata.description: The best we can hope for is to minimize the potential for conflicts that impede the growth of medical knowledge. Kudos to Dr. Steven E. Nissen for taking a confidence-inspiring step in that direction.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
